title.rendered: Celebrating Human Rights Day at Kendriya Vidyalaya

content.rendered:
Smile Foundationâ€™s Child For Child programme team celebrated Human Rights Day with the students of Kendriya Vidyalaya, Manesar on 10th December, 2014. On the occasion, CFC programme officer Ms Ruchira Shree spoke on human rights and apprised the children about the importance of Rights as well as various Articles embedded in the Constitution of India pertaining to Child Rights.

The children were joined by Principal Mrs Jeena, teachers from the school, and representatives from Smile Foundation, and everyone actively participated in the occasion. The students also presented a play based on Human Rights sensitization.
